phrases: Why did you completely burn our ingredients?
Have more faith in the gas stove.
I thought the heat was not strong enough.
Use a flame, not a blaze.
Your brain was the thing that was not strong enough.
That reminds me, this is my first time going shopping with Tohru, is not it?
I wonder what she is like when she is shopping.
You do not use the department store over there?
That place is like a castle and makes me uncomfortable.
The white color reminds me of the crusader's bases.
Shop at your local shopping district!
Use your point card for savings!
It is like the guild's bazaars.
So your standards are basically based on your past experiences, huh?
Well, let us start by buying the fish.
It is not often I see you with anyone.
We have got some good mackerel in today.
In that case, I will take two of those and two dried jack mackerel.
He gave us an extra fillet of mackerel...
Was not that nice of him?
Why are you friends with the fishmonger?
When I was courteous to him he started being nice in return, that is all.
Tohru, I think you have a tendency to not understand human emotions.
Of course things are different with you, Miss Kobayashi!
I will throw some extra in.
Oh, it is the cosplay lady!
This dragon's better at socializing than me?
She make talk condescendingly, calling humans
Care to have your romantic fortune read?
an inferior species and lesser creatures,
Thank you, but I am good on that front.
but she is interacting with them normally enough.
I guess she does not hate us.
Now that I think about it, I hardly know anything about Tohru.
I would like to know more...
I think it is probably best not to ask about that.
It is clearly a touchy topic for her.
Well, shall we buy some dessert?
Speaking of lightning, there is the Norse god Thor... is your name related to that?
According to my parents, it comes from an author here in this world.
Miss Kobayashi, may I stop him?
Uh, can you do it without exposing yourself as a dragon?
Good, now that I am this far away...
I cannot believe you are so strong!
You have got quite the legs on you!
I should have told you to hold back more.
You want to hold hands a little longer?
I will not wash this hand for a while.
I invited her into my house...
But she is Tohru's friend, right?
She has horns and a tail, so...
But Tohru's out shopping right now.
Today we are having meat and potato stew!
I know that you have seduced her.
Hey, are not you making a mistake?
Do not make things more complicated!
This girl is called Kanna Kamui.
She is an acquaintance of mine.
Tohru went missing, so I came searching for her.
Tohru, you need to let your friends know.
Still, I am surprised you found this place.
I saw Lady Tohru breathe fire on that cloudy day.
And I sensed your magic power.
You were careless there, huh, Tohru?
Lady Tohru, why are you in such an outfit?
I am in love with Miss Kobayashi!
I saw you on your date at the bazaar!
You were holding hands in public!
In that case, I will kill you if I must...
You have become incredibly powerless, have not you?
You are the odd one, Lady Tohru!
The mana purity here is too low!
But you do not have anywhere to stay, right?
Come on, look me in the eye and answer.
I think your dead-fish eyes are scary, Miss Kobayashi.
Kanna, please tell us honestly about what you are planning.
If you are after Miss Kobayashi, then I am sorry, but give it up.
Tohru, be quiet for a moment.
You were exiled for a prank?
Uh, so to sum things up...
She is probably not allowed to return until she reflects on her actions.
It would be futile for me to try sending her back.
So right now she is all on her own...
If you have no place to stay, want to live here?
You told me no the first time I asked, though.
Once you have one, two's nothing.
You are trying to use me!
So you cannot trust anyone in an unknown world?
I would not trust anyone either.
Trusting someone is something that happens after you become friends or become lovers.
Kanna-chan, I will not ask you to be my friend.
I am so glad I fell in love with Miss Kobayashi.
Am I domesticating her with food?
Kanna is a child, after all.
She wants to exercise her body to the fullest.
When I was a kid I spent my days playing video games, though...
Well then, would you like to play with me outside today?
Would you like to come, too, Miss Kobayashi?
I just landed in a big field that looked nice.
I am going to sleep off the fatigue from my deathma.
To work without rest under an overloaded schedule.
Wake me up when you are finished playing.
Okay, shall we play by ourselves?
I thought you were going to sleep?
What are you battling to the death over all of a sudden?!
We were just roughhousing a little bit is all.
Shoot, I am at the disadvantage here.
Oh, I bet you wanted to join in, too, right, Miss Kobayashi?
Jeez, you are not very honest.
It is fun to move around in a human body.
I thought your strength was gone, Kanna-chan?
The source of my power is electricity.
So it returned after I recharged.
If we are playing around, keep it to human standards.
We were at human standards, though?
In our world there are plenty of humans capable of doing that.
There is very few, in fact none, who can here.
No, I saw some on TV the other day.
That is fiction, it was not reality.
Oh, sorry, for crushing your dreams.
I will be sleeping over here.
Keep your playing around to my level.
So there you have it, Kanna.
First, let us try to recall how Miss Kobayashi usually acts.
I have seen it a few times now, but it is still terrifying.
If they felt like it, our world would be...
They would never destroy our world.
And that exhausted behavior is totally me, yeah.
I guess you really did not want to play, Miss Kobayashi.
You only left my tail-meat behind again!
Though if you turned it into ground meat, I probably would not notice.
But then you would not know it is my meat, would you?!
Miss Kobayashi, please do not peek into the kitchen until I call for you.
I do not need grilled tail.
Kanna, you have things to do with me today, do not you?
Kanna has not been in this world very long, so...
I thought I would teach her a few things.
I want to go with Kobayashi!
She is suddenly attached to me.
If you keep being selfish, I will break you.
Now then, Kanna, we are going to have you learn the commonsense of this society.
First, you should learn what you must not do.
First, you must honor traffic lights!
Otherwise, you will be hit by a car.
That is what those iron boxes are called?
Apparently you need a device called a license for them.
I would love to try riding in a car!
She seems to possess a license, but she does not have a car.
Apparently it imposes strains called vehicle inspections or loans.
I guess power comes at a price in every world.
Oh, but it would be really easy if she had you carry her!
Why does not Kobayashi do that?
Wow, you have got another relative with you?
A Gothic lolita with a tribal theme.
Tohru said she was going to teach her some things, but I am so worried.
First we should run tests using this module.
Tohru-chan seems to have her act together, though.
Then merge it with this one, and run an integration test.
Well, I suppose perhaps she does have a lot of compassion for her friends.
You can get through most conversations using them, so try to remember them.
It looks like it uses the principle of levers, but...
That is a training device for catapults!
This is how children learn the means of combating monsters in the sky!
It is sweet, like yatagarasu eggs.
Are there dragons in this world?
I do not know if they went extinct or if they moved elsewhere...
Is it wrong to revert to my original form?
Yes, it is fine, it is fine, it is all right.
Well, I would not let your form be seen, at least.
Can you use perception blocking, Kanna?
Well, there is hardly ever any need for it anyways.
Why did you come to this world?
So I was happy to find you survived.
I came to this world to escape.
Truth be told, I was on the verge of death,
I decided to repay her by being her maid.
While letting people think I was dead.
I have only told a handful of dragons about my survival.
Like Miss Lucoa and Mr. Fafnir.
I am very happy right now.
Come on, Kanna, is not there more you would like to know about?
I would like to see Kobayashi's work.
She will be mad at you.
Let us go say hello, then.
It is not practice for catapults?
It is equipment kids play on.
This is fun, is not it?!
Kanna, supposedly there are myriads of gods living here.
Lady Tohru, what does myriads mean?
Apparently gods reside in all manner of things here.
(That Does not Go Well, Of Course)
You cannot let your guard down.
